name: Rosa's Trip
description:
Happy fun times ahead, yay!

Extremely recommended: go to Options and set Always Dash to ON

Controls

Keyboard
Arrow keys = Move
Hold Shift while moving = Dash
Z/Enter = Accept/Talk
Esc = Menu

Mouse
Click to move and talk

Gamepad
Analog stick/Dpad = Move
Hold X/Square = Dash
A/X = Accept/Talk
Start = Menu

Bug reports and feedback always welcome.
